name: Nick Survives!
description:
Description

Nick Survives is a mini-survival, create-your-own-world game created for LudumDare 38! Craft your own world and survive for as long as you can!


Controls

A and D to move

L Mouse to use equipped item

E to pick up items


How to Play

Create a world by using the sliders then click start.

Use the correct tools to interact with the environment.

Survive as long as possible.

Enjoy :)
